revision.comment: not relevant, this device is not supported by OpenWrt mainline (and thus, probably not by LEDE mainline)
revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=Lyra |revision=(MAP-AC2200) A3 |asin=B073SGPY6M |newegg=N82E16833320334 |price=429 |series=AC2200 |est_release_date=04/30/2017 |fcc_date=06/21/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Pegatron |manuf_model=HiveSpot |manuf_rev=1.02 |availability=now |type=wireless router, wireless system, mesh node |fcc_id=MSQ-RTACBX00 |ic_id=3568A-RTACBX00 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NK643G89, K064300; |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NK643G89, K064300; |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NK643G89, K064300; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886;Q, QCA9886, 0VV, NE648TLK, E064804; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8072 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;2; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; ,,, Single Chip Bluetooth 4.0 (UART/HCI);Atheros;AR3012-BL3D;Atheros, AR3012-BL3D, FU538075, 1538, CN;1; ,,, Bluetooth 4.0 Dual-Mode SoC;Microchip (ISSC);IS1678SM;ISSC, IS1678SM, 151, 1634JNR;1; ,,, 9-Channel LED Lighting Driver;Texas Instruments;LP5523;;1; |flags=Wave2, 256QAM, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.0, LED, |stock_os=Linux;3.14; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS_XX_AMAPS |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS_[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}_AMAPS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=60:45:CB |oui_eth=60:45:CB }}
:• 2x '''867''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433 Mbps per stream), :• 1x '''400''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System}} Mesh Network - Seamless Coverage in Every Corner of Home :[https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ Product page] (Kit 3x) {{SupportPage|vendor=ASUS|model=Lyra}} *Web GUI: http://router.asus.com {{see also|ASUS MAP-AC2200|Pegatron}} *[http://www.apkmirror.com/apk/asustek-computer-inc/asus-lyra/ ''ASUS Lyra app'' on '''APKMirror'''] :Android ASUS Lyra App v1.0.0.0.20 (32.12 MByte 2017/06/01) ::Compatibility Models: :*[[ASUS Lyra]] (MAP-AC2200) :*[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] (MAP-AC1300) :*[[ASUS Lyra Trio]] (MAP-AC1750) :*[[ASUS Lyra Voice]] (AC2200) ===Overview=== *'''Banish Wi-Fi Dead Spots''' – Tri-band, tri-node system delivers :perfect Wi-Fi coverage to every corner of your home. *'''Smart Antenna Design''' – Connections between nodes are :automatically optimized to deliver fastest speeds. *'''Smooth Connections, Always''' – As you move around your home, :always be automatically connected to the best possible signal. *'''Commercial-grade Security''' - AiProtection blocks security threats :to protect all devices on your home network. *'''You’re in Control''' – ''ASUS Lyra app'' allows no-fuss setup, lets manage :bandwidth and informs you instantly about any technical problems. *'''Family Overview''' – The feature lets you easily view and control each :family members’ internet and app usage from your mobile device. ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/ipq4019 IPQ4019] @717MHz Quad Core Processor *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 400Mbps for 2.4GHz, 2x 867Mbps for 5GHz *Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK *Features: Wave2, MU-MIMO, Guest Wi-Fi, WPS, WMM :Adaptive QoS, AiProtection, Parental Control, IPv6 *Antenna: 7x internal antennas *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 1x LAN GbE *Operation Mode: Router, Access point *Dimensions: (150mm Dia x 50mm H) :150mm x 150mm x 50mm (LxWxH) (without bezel) *Power: DC 12V/2A adapter *Bluetooth: [[Atheros]] AR3012 ([https://wikidevi.com/files/Atheros/specsheets/AR3012.pdf Datasheet]) :''Microchip'' [http://www.issc.com.tw/products/data/content475d.html?id=71 BM79BLEDKMC2] Module ===Reviews=== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/33128-asus-lyra-home-wi-fi-system-reviewed ''ASUS Lyra Home Wi-Fi System Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.digitalcitizen.life/reviewing-asus-lyra-ac2200-mesh ''Reviewing the ASUS Lyra AC2200'' on '''DigitalCitizen'''] :F/W Ver.: 3.0.0.4_382_10522 H/W Ver.: A3 :OUI: 60:45:CB ([http://www.digitalcitizen.life/sites/default/files/gdrive/asus_lyra_ac2200/asus_lyra_ac2200_6.png sticker image]) ===Forum threads=== (Omega's blog) *[https://openitforum.pl/forums/topic/2076-asus-lyra-mesh-wifi/ On '''OpenITforum''' forums] (House's posts) ===See also=== *[[ASUS Blue Cave]] - ''AC2600 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Router'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Blue-Cave/ PPage] :128MB Flash, 512MB RAM, [[Intel]] Wi-Fi, IFTTT, IoT • [https://www.engadget.com/2017/05/29/asus-blue-cave-wireless-router/ Computex 2017] *[[ASUS Lyra]] - ''AC2200 Tri-Band Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 (2T2R 802.11abgn/ac) + QCA9886 (2T2R 5GHz) :*[[ASUS HiveSpot]] - ''AC2200 Multi-Point Wi-Fi System'' • CES 2017 *[[ASUS Lyra Mini]] - ''AC1300 Whole-Home Wi-Fi System'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/Lyra-Mini/ PPage] :[[Qualcomm]] IPQ4019 @717MHz Quad Core (2T2R
